#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

==Ruby==

Install ruby language >= 1.8 from http://www.ruby-lang.org (many linux distribution include it by defaults)

Install rubygems from http://rubyforge.org/frs/?group_id=126: it is a tool that let you install additional ruby libraries in a fast way (gem install XXX)

Install STOMP library with "gem install stomp"

==JAVA ==
You need Java jdk >= 1.5 (Java 1.6 is better)

==JMS (stomp) broker==

Download and install/uncompress a JMS broker like apache activemq (http:://activemq.apache.org) or fuse message broker (http://fusesource.com/downloads/)

{{{
 wget http://mirror.nohup.it/apache/activemq/apache-activemq/5.3.0/apache-activemq-5.3.0-bin.tar.gz
 tar xvfz apache-activemq-5.3.0-bin.zip
 cd apache-activemq-5.3.0
}}}
 
Check/Enable Stomp support in the file conf/activemq.xml (see http://activemq.apache.org/stomp.html)

Start ActiveMQ

{{{
 ./bin/activemq &
}}}

You can check if activemq and its admin console are available with
 http://localhost:8161/admin/: the queues wg.* will be created when you start word generations..
